stories.text:
Hi All,

I am the founder of Patches- The only full stack platform for Community-Led organizations and Community teams. We help startups with software to services(Virtual part time community manager), resources to recruiting, essentially everything they need to build and grow a thriving community. We are also making community building scientific and thus, help startups map its impact to overall business goals.

We help in:

- Building community end to end till the startups are ready to take it over (We know the best practices of community building and have access to 30+ experts)

- Capturing and quantifying the value of your community on different platforms (Donâ€™t have to spend more hours trying to explain its value to others, let the numbers speak)

- Establishing an incentivization and ambassador program (tokens, swag, etc.) for their advocates (We also take care of the logistics associated with it)

I would love to get some feedback on the idea and the concept of community led growth in general. Thank you!
